snippet.title: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna (PCE CD) — Playthrough (銀河お嬢様伝説ユナ)
snippet.description:
Galaxy Fräulein Yuna | 銀河お嬢様伝説ユナ
Developer: Hudson, Red Company, Will
Genre: Adventure
Released: 1992
Platform: PC Engine Super CD-ROM2

Description from Wikipedia/Mobygames:
Yuna Kagurazaka is a somewhat ditzy 16-year old girl. After winning a "Galactic Bishoujo Contest" (Galaxy Fräulein Contest, similar to Idol contests), she becomes "The Savior of Light", a magical girl charged with defending the universe from evil.The main protagonist of the series is Yuna Kagurazaka, a somewhat ditzy 16-year-old girl. After winning a "Galactic Bishoujo Contest", she becomes "The Savior of Light", a magical girl charged with defending the universe from evil. After becoming "The Savior of Light", Yuna gains an impressively powerful armored suit. Her greatest strength, however, lies in her ability to befriend anyone, even her enemies. Her group of comrades (which is extensive) is comprised almost exclusively of former opponents.

Galaxy Fräulein Yuna is digital comic game (visual novel type). The game has no game over (can infinitely continue) or bad ending, similar to story-telling digital comic books or interactive movies. Move somewhere, talk with somebody, then fight against the 13 Fräuleins of Darkness. Combat scenes are played out in turn-based RPG style, but there is no EXP or items – only attack or defence.

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzxHKbKxYksgRJbG8-w59E7Q9R-lIPfDa
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Game_Curiosity
